features.name: Disqus Connector Configuration
features.description: Configure and validate Disqus API credentials and forum shortname through the Connections interface
test_scenarios: Configure Disqus with valid API key and shortname
Configure Disqus with invalid API key - verify error message
Configure Disqus with invalid shortname format (uppercase/spaces) - verify validation
Configure Disqus with non-existent forum - verify error
Clear Disqus configuration by leaving fields empty
Verify configuration is encrypted in portal settings
Test configuration persistence across sessions

features.name: Disqus Forum Validation
features.description: Validates that the configured Disqus forum exists and API key is valid through Disqus API
test_scenarios: Validate existing Disqus forum with correct API key
Handle HTTP 403 Forbidden response for invalid API key
Handle HTTP 400 Bad Request for invalid shortname
Test API connectivity and timeout handling
Verify proper error logging for API failures

features.name: Disqus Configuration Retrieval
features.description: Retrieve Disqus configuration settings for the current portal through DisqusManager
test_scenarios: Retrieve shortname for configured portal
Check if Disqus has been configured
Handle missing configuration gracefully
Verify service locator pattern implementation
Test configuration retrieval across different portals

features.name: Publisher Module Disqus Integration
features.description: Display Disqus comments on Publisher module post detail pages when configured
features.ui_location: Publisher Module > Post Detail Page > Comments Section
test_scenarios: Display Disqus comments when properly configured
Hide Disqus comments when not configured
Hide comments in Edit mode
Hide comments for unpublished posts
Hide comments when comments are disabled for post
Verify Disqus thread loads with correct post identifier
Test Disqus thread title matches post title
Verify JavaScript fallback message for disabled JavaScript

features.name: New Comment Notification System
features.description: Notify the system when new comments are added through Disqus to trigger notifications
features.ui_location: Publisher Module > Post Detail Page > Comments
test_scenarios: Trigger notification when new comment is added
Verify AJAX request to NotifyAboutNewComment endpoint
Test anti-forgery token validation
Verify comment notification includes content item ID
Test notification with authenticated users
Test notification with anonymous users
Verify proper error handling for failed notifications

features.name: Disqus Shortname Format Validation
features.description: Validates that Disqus shortname follows required format (lowercase, no spaces)
test_scenarios: Accept lowercase shortname without spaces
Reject shortname with uppercase characters
Reject shortname with spaces
Reject shortname with special characters if applicable
Display appropriate validation error message

features.name: Connector Metadata and Properties
features.description: Provides connector metadata including name, icon, type, and plugin folder information
test_scenarios: Verify connector name is 'Disqus'
Verify connector icon URL is correct
Verify connector type is 'Social'
Verify SupportsMultiple is false
Verify IsEngageConnector is false
Test GetConnectors returns single instance

features.name: Disqus Connector Localization
features.description: Provides localized strings for UI elements and error messages
test_scenarios: Display localized field labels (API Key, Shortname)
Display localized validation error messages
Test fallback to default language
Verify all resource keys are properly defined
Test special characters in localized strings

features.name: Disqus Connector Installation
features.description: Install and register the Disqus Connector as a DNN extension package
test_scenarios: Install connector package successfully
Verify DNN Core version requirement (07.04.00)
Verify Evoq.Library dependency (08.01.00)
Verify assembly deployment to bin folder
Verify resource files deployment
Test upgrade from previous version
Test Azure compatibility

features.name: Configuration Security
features.description: Encrypts and decrypts Disqus API credentials using DNN portal security
test_scenarios: Verify API key is encrypted before storage
Verify shortname is encrypted before storage
Verify successful decryption on retrieval
Test encryption with Host GUID
Verify encrypted values in database
Test configuration security across portals
